ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Closed Won")&& ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , " <> Direct, Accounting, Benefit Broker, Financial Institution, PEO, TPA, As(k), Retail, Advisor, Payroll")&& $User.Id <> "00500000006yBQC"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Update Lead Source to Current Methodologies
